document.full_text: the irish relatives of tony adams, the original "spider-man" producer who died in 2005, came to new york to see the show.
document.title: for a late producer's family, a delayed visit to 'spider-man' is worth the wait
lines_and_colors: the irish relatives of tony adams, the original "spider-man" producer who died in 2005, came to new york to see the show.
